record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 3344
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 3344 -- (Senate - July 28, 2008)

[Page: S7578]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand S. 3344 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for the second time.
The bill clerk read as follows:

A bill (S. 3344) to defend against child exploitation and child pornography through improved Internet Crimes Against Children task forces and enhanced tools to block illegal images, and to eliminate the unwarranted release of convicted sex offenders.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to any further proceedings with respect to the bill.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar under rule XIV.
